DOC.brief_title: Genetic Polymorphisms Interleukin-1B TNF-A HBV-Related Hepatocellular Carcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: Hepatitis B virus ( HBV ) infection major risk factor chronic liver disease hepatocellular carcinoma ( HCC ) . Host immunogenetic factor contribute HBV-associated liver damage and/or carcinogenesis . Variant cytokine allele , include tumor necrosis factor-α ( TNF-α ) interleukin-1β ( IL-1β ) , might contribute interindividual difference inflammatory response account heterogeneous disease outcome infectious disease . By detect polymorphisms IL-1β TNF-α , study aim find effect cytokine gene polymorphism ( interaction ) susceptibility severity HBV-related HCC .
